name: Wolf's Gravestone
r1: Increases Base ATK by 20%. On hit, attacks against enemies with less than 30% HP increase all party members' Base ATK by 40% for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.
r2: Increases Base ATK by 25%. On hit, attacks against enemies with less than 30% HP increase all party members' Base ATK by 50% for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.
r3: Increases Base ATK by 30%. On hit, attacks against enemies with less than 30% HP increase all party members' Base ATK by 60% for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.
r4: Increases Base ATK by 35%. On hit, attacks against enemies with less than 30% HP increase all party members' Base ATK by 70% for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.
r5: Increases Base ATK by 40%. On hit, attacks against enemies with less than 30% HP increase all party members' Base ATK by 80% for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.
